content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -122.0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (-59.5, -111.5)
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -122.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-68.5, -95.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to an Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0)

### Copper Ore Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0)

### Iron Plate Processing and Storage Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, -61.5)
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5)

### Pipe Network
Consists of multiple Pipe Groups connecting various entities, facilitating fluid transport.

### Electricity Network
Consists of Small Electric Poles interconnecting various entities, providing electrical power distribution.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Crafting Small Electric Poles
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients, like copper plates, are available in the inventory or can be crafted using available facilities.

### Errors in Extracting from Furnace
- Verify the presence of the required item in the furnace before attempting extraction. Ensure the furnace contains the item you wish to extract.

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
